content: this legal text summarizes a notary document from december 17 2010 which involves the division of assets between two parties mr mv and mr n the assets include two apartments and an urban area in osimo italy the first apartment is on the first floor and has four rooms while the second apartment is on the ground floor and has three rooms the urban area is 68 square meters the document states that the parties have agreed to divide the assets into two shares mr mv will receive the first share which includes the firstfloor apartment valued at €33000 mr n will receive the second share which includes the groundfloor apartment and the urban area also valued at €33000 the document is signed by the parties and the notary

metadata.subject_of_succession: two apartments and an urban area
